bug.author: robert-wagner
bug.summary: Test share for keras does not work on macos in a virtual env
bug.description:
Describe the bug Due to firewall issues, it is not possible to run test share on macos in a venv. This can be remedied by replacing network calls with mock. To Reproduce run make_test on a fresh macos install
contact <denchmark-link:https://github.com/robert-wagner>@robert-wagner</denchmark-link> to replicate as it is still broken on his system

comments.comment: Mind taking a look at the linked PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/robert-wagner>@robert-wagner</denchmark-link> ?
